 9: namespace Slim\Interfaces;
10: 
11: use Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface;
12: use Psr\Http\Message\ServerRequestInterface;
13: 
14: /**
15:  * Defines a contract for invoking a route callable.
16:  */
17: interface InvocationStrategyInterface
18: {
19:     /**
20:      * Invoke a route callable.
21:      *
22:      * @param callable               $callable The callable to invoke using the strategy.
23:      * @param ServerRequestInterface $request The request object.
24:      * @param ResponseInterface      $response The response object.
25:      * @param array                  $routeArguments The route's placholder arguments
26:      *
27:      * @return ResponseInterface|string The response from the callable.
28:      */
29:     public function __invoke(
30:         callable $callable,
31:         ServerRequestInterface $request,
32:         ResponseInterface $response,
33:         array $routeArguments
34:     );
35: }
